characters: Driver of a white sedan, motorcyclist
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a busy urban road. Various vehicles and pedestrians are present on both sides of the road. A motorcyclist appears from the right side and moves into the lane ahead of the self-driving vehicle.
actions: The self-driving vehicle maintains a steady speed while navigating through the urban road. The vehicles speed remains consistent to avoid sudden braking or acceleration due to the presence of pedestrians and vehicles on both sides.
key_objects: 1) Right side: A motorcyclist, approximately 5 meters away, moving into the lane ahead of the self-driving vehicle. 2) Front: A white sedan, approximately 20 meters away, parked on the roadside, possibly about to start or turn suddenly.
